Behavior_Decription: Gripper pick up component from the plate
Detect component, ready to execute OnFly Scanning
Scan the component to get image
The gripper pick up component when component is on the PCB
Put component back to the plate
Conveyor stop to wait for the next order
Conveyor lifted up to fix the lock the PCB
Robot Arm holds the PPOP Module to move
Use Teach Pendant or PC to set the Robot Ram points
